text: Afrodisiac is a funk/soul album by The Main Ingredient. Released in 1973 by RCA Records, the album features several songs written or co-written by Stevie Wonder. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== *Bert De Coteaux - arranger, conductor *Buzz Willis - production supervisor *Acy R. Lehman - art direction *Nick Sangiamo - photography ==Charts== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chart (1973) !
